bib.title: Multi-layered social network creation based on bibliographic data
bib.author: Kazienko, Przemysaw and Br{\'o}dka, Piotr and Musial, Katarzyna and Gaworecki, Jarosaw
bib.abstract: A method for extraction of the multi-layered social network based on the data about human collaborative achievements, in particular scientific papers, is presented in the paper. The objects linking people form a hierarchy, which is flattened in the pre-processing stage. Only one level of the hierarchy remains together with new activities moved from its other levels. Separate layers of the multi-layered social network are created based on these pre-processed activities.
bib.booktitle: 2010 IEEE Second International Conference on Social Computing
